inline: apt-get update && apt-get -y install curl sudo gpg

mkdir /etc/service/php-fpm && printf '#!/bin/bash
exec /sbin/setuser www-data /usr/sbin/php-fpm7.2 --nodaemonize
' > /etc/service/php-fpm/run && chmod +x /etc/service/php-fpm/run && sed -i 's#/var/log/php7.2-fpm.log#/var/log/nginx/php7.2-fpm.log#' /etc/php/7.2/fpm/php-fpm.conf

chown www-data:www-data /var/log/nginx && rm -f /var/log/nginx/* && mkdir /var/run/nginx && chown www-data:www-data /var/run/nginx && sed -i 's#/var/run/nginx.pid#/var/run/nginx/nginx.pid#' /etc/nginx/nginx.conf && mkdir /etc/service/nginx && printf '#!/bin/sh
exec /sbin/setuser www-data /usr/sbin/nginx -g "daemon off;"' > /etc/service/nginx/run && chmod +x /etc/service/nginx/run
